body:
This is a good question; and I unfortunately I did not document the entire
sequence of design decisions leading to this.  However, at some point we
saw it was necessary to either do this, or add a lot of special logic
inside the beam search decoder to add special casing for *specific*
RNNCells; and we did not want to do this.
